description: Detects process handle on LSASS process with certain access mask
author: Roberto Rodriguez
Teymur Kheirkhabarov
Dimitrios Slamaris
Mark Russinovich
Aleksey Potapov
oscd.community (update)
false_positives: Legitimate software accessing LSASS process for legitimate reason; update the whitelist with it
name: Generic Password Dumper Activity on LSASS
query: (winlog.channel:Security AND (((winlog.event_id:4656 AND winlog.event_data.ObjectName:/.*\\[Ll][Ss][Aa][Ss][Ss]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ AND winlog.event_data.AccessMask:(*0x40* OR *0x1400* OR *0x100000* OR *0x1410* OR *0x1010* OR *0x1438* OR *0x143a* OR *0x1418* OR *0x1f0fff* OR *0x1f1fff* OR *0x1f2fff* OR *0x1f3fff*))) OR ((winlog.event_id:4663 AND winlog.event_data.ObjectName:/.*\\[Ll][Ss][Aa][Ss][Ss]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ AND winlog.event_data.AccessList:(*4484* OR *4416*)))) AND (NOT (((winlog.event_data.ProcessName:(/.*\\[Cc][Ss][Rr][Ss][Ss]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Gg][Aa][Mm][Ii][Nn][Gg][Ss][Ee][Rr][Vv][Ii][Cc][Ee][Ss]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Ll][Ss][Mm]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt][Ee][Dd][Gg][Ee][Uu][Pp][Dd][Aa][Tt][Ee]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Mm][Ii][Nn][Ii][Oo][Nn][Hh][Oo][Ss][Tt]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Mm][Rr][Tt]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Mm][Ss][Mm][Pp][Ee][Nn][Gg]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Pp][Ee][Rr][Ff][Mm][Oo][Nn]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Pp][Rr][Oo][Cc][Ee][Xx][Pp]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Pp][Rr][Oo][Cc][Ee][Xx][Pp]64\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Ss][Vv][Cc][Hh][Oo][Ss][Tt]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Tt][Aa][Ss][Kk][Mm][Gg][Rr]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Tt][Hh][Oo][Rr]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Tt][Hh][Oo][Rr]64\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Vv][Mm][Tt][Oo][Oo][Ll][Ss][Dd]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Vv][Ss][Tt][Ss][Kk][Mm][Gg][Rr]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Ii][Nn][Ii][Tt]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Ww][Mm][Ii][Pp][Rr][Vv][Ss][Ee]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR *RtkAudUService64) AND winlog.event_data.ProcessName:(/[Cc]\:\\[Pp][Rr][Oo][Gg][Rr][Aa][Mm]\ [Ff][Ii][Ll][Ee][Ss]\ \([Xx]86\)\\.*/ OR /[Cc]\:\\[Pp][Rr][Oo][Gg][Rr][Aa][Mm]\ [Ff][Ii][Ll][Ee][Ss]\\.*/ OR /[Cc]\:\\[Pp][Rr][Oo][Gg][Rr][Aa][Mm][Dd][Aa][Tt][Aa]\\[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt]\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\ [Dd][Ee][Ff][Ee][Nn][Dd][Ee][Rr]\\[Pp][Ll][Aa][Tt][Ff][Oo][Rr][Mm]\\.*/ OR /[Cc]\:\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\[Ss][Yy][Ss][Nn][Aa][Tt][Ii][Vv][Ee]\\.*/ OR /[Cc]\:\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\[Ss][Yy][Ss][Tt][Ee][Mm]32\\.*/ OR /[Cc]\:\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\[Ss][Yy][Ss][Ww][Oo][Ww]64\\.*/ OR /[Cc]\:\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\[Tt][Ee][Mm][Pp]\\[Aa][Ss][Gg][Aa][Rr][Dd]2\-[Aa][Gg][Ee][Nn][Tt]\\.*/))) OR (winlog.event_data.ProcessName:/[Cc]\:\\[Pp][Rr][Oo][Gg][Rr][Aa][Mm]\ [Ff][Ii][Ll][Ee][Ss].*/) OR (winlog.event_data.ProcessName:(/[Cc]\:\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\[Ss][Yy][Ss][Tt][Ee][Mm]32\\[Tt][Aa][Ss][Kk][Hh][Oo][Ss][Tt][Ww]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /[Cc]\:\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\[Ss][Yy][Ss][Tt][Ee][Mm]32\\[Mm][Ss][Ii][Ee][Xx][Ee][Cc]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /[Cc]\:\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\[Cc][Cc][Mm]\\[Cc][Cc][Mm][Ee][Xx][Ee][Cc]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/)) OR ((winlog.event_data.ProcessName:/[Cc]\:\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\[Ss][Yy][Ss][Mm][Oo][Nn]64\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ AND winlog.event_data.AccessList:/.*\%\%4484.*/)) OR ((winlog.event_data.ProcessName:/[Cc]\:\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\[Tt][Ee][Mm][Pp]\\[Aa][Ss][Gg][Aa][Rr][Dd]2\-[Aa][Gg][Ee][Nn][Tt]\-[Ss][Cc]\\[Aa][Uu][Rr][Oo][Rr][Aa]\\.*/ AND winlog.event_data.ProcessName:/.*\\[Aa][Uu][Rr][Oo][Rr][Aa]\-[Aa][Gg][Ee][Nn][Tt]\-64\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ AND winlog.event_data.AccessList:/.*\%\%4484.*/)) OR ((winlog.event_data.ProcessName:/.*\\[Xx]64\\[Ss][Cc][Ee][Nn][Aa][Rr][Ii][Oo][Ee][Nn][Gg][Ii][Nn][Ee]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ AND winlog.event_data.AccessList:/.*\%\%4484.*/)) OR ((winlog.event_data.ProcessName:/[Cc]\:\\[Uu][Ss][Ee][Rr][Ss]\\.*/ AND winlog.event_data.ProcessName:/.*\\[Aa][Pp][Pp][Dd][Aa][Tt][Aa]\\[Ll][Oo][Cc][Aa][Ll]\\[Tt][Ee][Mm][Pp]\\[Ii][Ss]\-.*/ AND winlog.event_data.ProcessName:/.*\\[Aa][Vv][Ii][Rr][Aa]\_[Ss][Yy][Ss][Tt][Ee][Mm]\_[Ss][Pp][Ee][Ee][Dd][Uu][Pp]\.[Tt][Mm][Pp]/ AND winlog.event_data.AccessList:/.*\%\%4484.*/)) OR ((winlog.event_data.ProcessName:/[Cc]\:\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\[Ss][Yy][Ss][Tt][Ee][Mm]32\\[Ss][Nn][Mm][Pp]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ AND winlog.event_data.AccessList:/.*\%\%4484.*/)))))
